arts.ttl: Thierry Henry delivers Arsenal Champions League verdict with three big reasons given
arts.sum: Thierry Henry believes Arsenal's 7-1 Champions League win over PSV Eindhoven will instil confidence in the team to compete for European glory. In the middle of having to deal with an abrupt end to the Premier League title race, Arsenal are guaranteed to progress to the quarter-finals of the competition and could get a major boost before facing either Real Madrid or Atletico Madrid.

arts.ttl: PSV boss points at two moments which could have changed game before 7-1 defeat to Arsenal
arts.sum: Arsenal smashed PSV Eindhoven 7-1 in the first leg of their Champions League last 16 clash, but the Dutch side's manager insisted things could have turned out differently

arts.ttl: PSV's ex-Spurs star left with egg on his face after comments before Arsenal thrashing
arts.sum: Ivan Perisic discussed Arsenal's lack of trophies in the build-up to Tuesday's Champions League clash which saw his side, PSV Eindhoven, suffer a record 7-1 loss

arts.ttl: Arsenal, Ethan Nwaneri, Myles Lewis-Skelly set new Champions League records in PSV obliteration
arts.sum: Arsenal, Ethan Nwaneri and Myles Lewis-Skelly all write their name into the Champions League record books in the Gunners' 7-1 destruction of PSV Eindhoven.

arts.ttl: PSV 1-7 Arsenal: Highlights, man of the match, stats as glorious Gunners make Champions League history
arts.sum: Arsenal put one foot firmly in the quarter-finals of the Champions League with a 6-1 annihilation of PSV Eindhoven in the first leg of their last-16 battle.

arts.ttl: Arsenal in seventh heaven in Champions League rout of PSV Eindhoven
arts.sum: Martin Odegaard scored twice in the Netherlands as Mikel Arteta’s side defied their lack of a recognised striker.

arts.ttl: Arsenal hit seven in thumping Champions League win away to PSV Eindhoven
arts.sum: Aston Villa and Real Madrid also hold first-leg leads.

arts.ttl: Arsenal in seventh heaven in Champions League rout of PSV Eindhoven
arts.sum: Martin Odegaard scored twice in the Netherlands as Mikel Arteta’s side defied their lack of a recognised striker.

arts.ttl: Champions League live blog: Real Madrid-Atlético, PSV-Arsenal
arts.sum: Enjoy live updates from Tuesday's Champions League action as Real Madrid take on Atlético Madrid, PSV take on Arsenal and Dortmund take on Lille.

arts.ttl: Why are Arsenal wearing white shorts against PSV in the Champions League?
arts.sum: The Gunners are in an alternative look for their Champions League clash
